text: (Bouteille en prélude à Adam Green à L.A): Cire à chaussure, insistance fruitée liquoreuse et chaleur allourdissante. Des allures de Porto blanc.

smooth sake. .. quite a lot of sweetness, but not overdone .. . super slick and not even a hint of heat .. .a very well done sake, i am really impressed. . id buy more of this for sure! .. . . free willzyx
Bottle at home. Pours golden with nose of sweet plums. Tastes of plum, rice, hint of apricot, and simple syrup. Not as thick and syrupy as some infused sakes go. Could be cleaner though.

Pours gold and clear. Fruity dark fruit aroma with hint of yeast. Sweet sherry like taste, very nice aperitif. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Bottle that we took to Andys New Years Eve party/tasting/Fluxx tournament.  Pours a clear yellow gold.  Smells a bit of salad dressing, savory and sweet.  Weird aromas.  Medium bodied, super sweet, toasty and warm, a touch of fruit.  Finishes with some lingering acidity and warmth.  Very odd.
Tasting at YesprPale yelow color. Aroma of fresh hazelnuts and fresh wood sap. Sweet flavor, plums (not as sweet as umeshu, but covering the sake). Pleasant non-sake.

From the Bottle at the Cabinn Hotel, Copenhagen 08/05/2010
Fruity aroma. Clear and strong in alcohol. Sweet on the palate with a warming slightly dry finish.
Bottled (thanks yespr). Pale yellow colour, n head. Aroma is rice, fruits, some alcohol as well as mild plummy notes. Flavour is sweet plum, some rice, alcohol. A quite nice balanced Sake.

Bottle 300ml.Clear light white color with virtually none head. Aroma is moderate to light heavy rice and alcohol, light to moderate plum, honey notes. Flavor is heavy sweet with a long duration, alcohol, plum. Body is medium, texture is oily, carbonation is flat, finish feel is moderate alcoholic. [20100409]
Clear golden with a tiny white head. Aroma had rice, plums and fruity notes. Sweet and fruity flavour with honey and floral notes. Finished sweet. Thanks yespr!

Bottle 30 cl. Courtesy of yespr. Pours an almost clear pale yellow. Fruity yet slightly tart aroma. Medium body, sweet fruity with some rice accents. A little tart, yet sweet and spicy. The alcohol is extremely wel hidden. 090410

Bottled. A golden sake. The aroma has notes of plums, rice, and alcohol. The flavor is sweet with strong notes of fruits - plums and more on a back ground of rice and alcohol, leading to a fruity finish. Thanks yespr for sharing.

Non-carbonated. Served chilled. Nice golden yellow color, like a white wine. Pleasing aroma with ever so slight pluminess to it. At first taste you clearly taste the sweetness of the plum extract, but it finishes with an unmistakable rice flavor to it. Body is nice. Not too thin, but not syrupy like some sakes can be. If it didnt have the rice aftertaste you might fool me into thinking this is a white wine w/plum in it. The first sake Ive had that Im likely to buy again!
